alert.note: Alert for Pearl River; Pike; Walthall (Mississippi) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued June 19 at 9:00PM CDT by NWS New Orleans
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of north central St. Tammany and Washington Parishes, southern Walthall, southeastern Pike and northern Pearl River Counties through 930 PM CDT... At 858 PM CDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm over Varnado, or near Bogalusa, moving southeast at 50 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 30 mph and pea size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Bogalusa, Franklinton, Poplarville, Tylertown, Varnado, Sun, Enon, Crossroads, Mount Herman, Bush, Dexter, Mcneil and Angie. This includes Interstate 59 in Mississippi between mile markers 18 and 28. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.25 IN MAX WIND GUST...30 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. A Severe Thunderstorm Watch remains in effect until 100 AM CDT for southeastern Louisiana...and southern Mississippi.
